# Tender Announcement for Canadian Coast Guard Antenna Systems and Antenna Supporting Structures Standing Offer

**Tender Title and Details**
 ears for Standing Offer: F1705-230824 Canadian Coast Guard Antenna Systems and Antenna Supporting Structures Standing Offer - BC

**Tender Reference and Status**
 Tender Reference: WS4474545094
 Tender Number: WS4474545094-Doc4474625337
 Tender Status: Expired (Offering closed on March 21, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT)

**Tender Overview**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenderers to bid on a Standing Offer for the provision of construction services for antenna systems and antenna supporting structures for the Canadian Coast Guard. The contractor will provide all labour, material, tools, equipment, supervision, and transportation required to complete the construction services for various locations along the west coast of British Columbia on an as-and-when-requested basis.

**Contract Details**
- Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Contract Duration: Anticipated from April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2027, for a three-year period, with 2 one-year option periods.
- Estimated Contract Value: $2,205,000.00 (GST inclusive), for the initial period of the standing offer.
- Selection Criteria: Combination of Technical Merit and Price.

**Tender Documents and Contact Information**
All tender documents are available online at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18994976](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18994976).

Inquiries and bids can be submitted via the online tendering system. Please contact Ken Ngan (SPAC/PSPC) at [ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for additional information.

**Regions and Locations**
The construction services will be provided for various locations along the west coast of British Columbia.

**Trade Agreements**
The tender is open to contractors that have the necessary trade agreements in place, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). I
